original_content:
Join us on Wednesday, July 5 at noon Pacific for the 3D Printing Food Hack Chat with Ellie Weinstein!
In the right hands, food goes beyond mere sustenance and becomes a work of art. Weve all seen examples  the carefully crafted blends of flavors, the quality ingredients expertly cooked, the artful platings that make a dramatic presentation at the table. But where the artistry really seems to take off is with desserts, which pastry chefs and confectioners can take to the next level with edible sculptures of chocolate and other sweets that can tower dramatically over the table.
Thats all well and good for the haute cuisine set, but what about the rest of us? We cant all have the talent and drive needed to produce edible art, so perhaps we can leverage technology to help us out. Thats just one of the rationales behind food 3D printing, which is what well be exploring with Ellie Weinstein. Shes the CEO of Cocoa Press, where theyre bringing chocolate 3D printing to the mainstream. Its not as easy as you might think  there are plenty of nuances and engineering challenges when youre trying to print chocolate or any other kind of food. Make sure you stop by and check it out; its sure to be a treat.
Our Hack Chats are live community events in the Hackaday.io Hack Chat group messaging. This week we’ll be sitting down on Wednesday, July 5 at 12:00 PM Pacific time. If time zones have you tied up, we have a handy time zone converter.
title: エリー・ワインスティンと一緒に食品の3Dプリントについて話し合おう！
body: 水曜日の7月5日の正午に、Ellie Weinsteinとの3Dプリント食品のハックチャットに参加してください！食べ物は芸術作品になることがありますが、技術を使って美味しいものを作るのは難しいです。Cocoa PressのCEOである彼女は、チョコレートの3Dプリントの普及を目指しています。エンジニアリングの課題にも直面しています。
titles: エリー・ワインスティンと一緒に食品の3Dプリントについて話し合おう！
食品3Dプリント技術で自分自身のデザートを作ろう！
メインストリームでのチョコレート3Dプリントとは？
食品の3Dプリントにおける工学的な課題やニュアンスについて知ろう！
ハックチャットで食品の3Dプリントについて詳しく学ぼう！
